Class Lesson

  • java.lang.Object
    • Lesson

  • public class Lesson
extends java.lang.Object
    Data class to contain all necessary data about lessons.
    Version:
    3.0 October 30th, 2014
    Author:
    Jason P'ng

        Constructor of this lesson, setting data with the given title, date, and arrayList of activities.
        Parameters:
        title - The title of this lesson.
        date - The date this lesson was made.
        activities - The list of activities for this lesson to contain.
